mapper.insert: insert into banner (uid, title, image_path, banner_link_url, description, created_at) values(#{uid}, #{title}, #{image_path}, #{banner_link_url}, #{description}, #{created_at})
mapper.update: update banner set uid=#{uid}, title=#{title}, image_path=#{image_path}, banner_link_url=#{banner_link_url}, description=#{description} where uid=#{uid}
